SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.commons

Class Message

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.commons.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Message extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a message. It's also the parser for both client and server. It parses a message to be sent or received with a set of constructors and getters.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message(org.json.simple.JSONObject json)
      Constructor for a normal json message.
      Parameters:
      json - the json object.

    • Message

      public Message(File jsonFile) throws IOException
      Constructor for a normal json message from a file.
      Parameters:
      jsonFile - the json file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found.

    • Message

      public Message(String category, String username, int age, boolean isFirstGame, int numPlayer)
      Constructor for the login message. When it is called, only one of the parameters is used, the others are set to default values.
      Parameters:
      category - category of the message (what's the message about).
      username - username of the player.
      age - age of the player.
      isFirstGame - if it's the first game of the player.
      numPlayer - number of players in the game.

    • Message

      public Message(List<Player> players, List<CommonGoal> commonGoalList, Board board, String currentPlayer)
      Constructor for the current game backUp message.
      Parameters:
      players - the current list of players.
      commonGoalList - the list of common goals.
      board - the current board of the game.
      currentPlayer - the current player.

    • Message

      public Message(HashMap<String,Integer> winners, HashMap<String,Integer> losers)
      Constructor for the end game message.
      Parameters:
      winners - HashMap containing the winners and their scores.
      losers - HashMap containing the losers and their scores.

    • Message

      public Message(int personalGoal, List<CommonGoal> commonGoalList, HashMap<String,Bookshelf> bookshelves, Board board, List<Integer> topOfScoringList, String firstPlayer, HashMap<String,List<Integer>> currentScores)
      Constructor for the startGame message.
      Parameters:
      personalGoal - personal goal of the player.
      commonGoalList - list of common goals (of size 1 or 2).
      bookshelves - hashmap of bookshelves (bookshelf, username of the player who owns it).
      board - board of the game.
      topOfScoringList - top of the scoring list of the common goals points.
      firstPlayer - username of the first player.
      currentScores - Hashmap of the current scores of the players.

    • Message

      public Message(String category, HashMap<String,Bookshelf> bookshelves, Board board, List<Integer> score, List<Integer> topOfScoringList)
      Constructor for the update message.
      Parameters:
      category - category of the message (what's the message about).
      bookshelves - hashmap of bookshelves (bookshelf, username of the player who owns it).
      board - board of the game.
      score - list of current scoring of the player where each element is a different scoring.

    • Message

      public Message(String category, String name, int number)
      Constructor for an int content message.
      Parameters:
      category - category of the message (what's the message about).
      name - name of the content.
      number - content of the message.

    • Message

      public Message(String singleMessage)
      Constructor for the single message. It is used for response messages from the server.
      Parameters:
      singleMessage - message to be sent.

    • Message

      public Message(int size, List<String> names, List<Integer> scores)
      Constructor for the winners message.
      Parameters:
      size - size of the list of winners.
      names - usernames of the winners.

    • Message

      public Message(Coordinates from, Coordinates to)
      Constructor for the pick message. (Coordinates of items picked from the board)
      Parameters:
      from - coordinates of the first item picked.
      to - coordinates of the last item picked.

    • Message

      public Message(List<Item> picked)
      Constructor for the items picked message. (Items picked from the board)
      Parameters:
      picked - list of items picked.

    • Message

      public Message(String category, List<Integer> sort)
      Constructor for the sort message. (the new order of the items picked)
      Parameters:
      category - category of the message (sort).
      sort - list of the new order of the items picked.

    • Message

      public Message(String category, String type, List<String> disconnected)
      Constructor for the disconnection message. (the username/s of the player/s who disconnected)
      Parameters:
      category - category of the message (disconnection)
      disconnected - list of the username/s of the player/s who disconnected

    • Message

      public Message(String type, String argument)
      Constructor for a generic String message.
      Parameters:
      type - category of the message (reconnection)
      argument - the argument of the message

    • Message

      public Message(String type, String argument, String player)
      Message for the reconnect of a player
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the message (reconnection)
      argument - the username of the reconnected player
      player - the username whose turn is
